internationalizations.description:
I am a passionate Engineer who strive in quality work.I have done a few projects which vary from Full Stack,Blockchain Technology,System programming. I have always been open to the challenges that comes my way.

During my 3rd Semester I have developed deep interest in Web Application Development and hence explored it a lot and was happy to build a few. I was fascinated by the Blockchain Technology when I attended a Blockchain workshop in IIT Bombay during my 3rd Semester.After coming back I understood how Blockchain works and the scope of Blockchain Technology in transforming the country in many fields and hence started exploring it and learnt Solidity and build a couple of Web Apps.

Meanwhile I developed great interest in some my course work like Operating Systems,Computer Networks,Algorithms and Data Structures which motivated me to learn more in this domain. Hence I decided to pursue my Masters from some Top institutes of the country and this is when I was introduced to GATE exam by one of my Professors.

GATE is one of the toughest competitive exams for Engineering grads which opens the door to pursue Masters and Phd from top institutes of the country.

I was quick to start my preparation and I am happy that I was able to crack the exam with All India Rank 1002. Finally I am admitted to Masters program in Computer Science in International Institute of Information Technology, Bangalore.

Currently I am looking for Software Engineer Summer Internships. I am looking for organizations that would challenge me with projects that require me to work outside my comfort zone.

I would love to learn new skills,which the organization would want me to because I believe this is how I could enhance my learning.
I am looking forward to work with some of the talented Engineers working on the projects at larger scale impacting the lives of millions of people.
